catalogue_description: Hebrew and Judaica Manuscripts at the Bodleian Libraries, Oxford University
title: Collection of kabbalistic works
author: Abraham ben David, of Posquières (attributed to)
description: Contents: Sefer ha-Temunah (Book 2) (ff. 1r-11v). Perush Shem ben Shivʿim ṿe-stayim (ff. 12v-26v). Perush Shemaʿ Yiśraʾel (ff. 27r-32r). Commentary on the Passover Haggadah (ff. 33r-39r). Perush Shem ben arbayim ṿe-stayim otiyot (ff. 40r-41r). Perush ha-tefilot (extract) (ff. 41v-42r). Yetsirat ha-golem (extracts) (ff. 42v-43r). Perush Sefer yetsirah, attributed to Abraham ben Samuel Abulafia (ff. 44r-53r). Sefer yetsirah (ff. 56r-59v). Perush Sefer yetsirah, attributed to Abraham ben David of Posquières (ff. 60r-87r). Sefer ha-Bahir (ff. 88r-101r). Kabalah me-ʻinyan ha-tefilah (ff. 101v-102v). Tefilat ha-yiḥud, attributed to Neḥunya ben ha-Kanah (ff. 103r-104r).
